TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器，用于将 对象与其他类型的对象进行转换。

span.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类还提供了一些方法，用于将 XML 纸张规范写入 XML 纸张规范 (xps) 包，并 从 xps 包读取，该文件提供表示的统一资源标识符 (URI) 的字符串 。This class also has methods for writing a to an XML Paper Specification (XPS) package and reading a from an XPS package that is given a string that represents the uniform resource identifier (URI) of the . 有关重要的使用说明，请参阅基本类和。See the base classes and for important usage notes.

span.span: Windows Imaging Component
